# NETWORK::NETWORK_IS_FRIEND

## Parameters
* **GAMER_HANDLE\*** gamerHandle

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Checks if player represented by this gamer handle is a friend of the local player
